doc.title: Lord Owen's Lady
doc.plot: Lord Owen is a reckless man living off his father's wealth. He is given one chance to redeem himself and keep his inheritance. Mena lives in Delhi and dreams of the perfect man. Her parents have other ideas. Mena visits her aunt in Cardiff and starts to work at a homeless shelter. Lord Owen determined to keep his inheritance also starts work there. Drawn to Mena Owen is faced with the choice to take what he has always wanted - money or the woman he has come to truly love.
